# codemirror-lang-html-n8n

HTML + n8n expression language support for CodeMirror 6. 

Based on: 
- [`@codemirror/lang-html`](https://github.com/codemirror/lang-html) (src)
- [`@lezer/html`](https://github.com/lezer-parser/html) (src/grammar)
